BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Marchi, S.6155, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.9722, "AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the retirement and social security law, in relation to benefits for employees of governmental entities performing peace officer services in the city of New York, who are injured in the performance of their duties".
Items.MatterName: Benefits for employees of governmental entities performing peace officer services (S.6155, A.9722)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Senators Maltese, Balboni, Hannon, Johnson, Lavalle, Leibell, Marcellino, Marchi, Morahan, Padavan, Spano, Trunzo and Velella, S.6472, "AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the general municipal law, in relation to pensions paid to certain uniformed employees of the city of New York".
Items.MatterName: Pensions paid to certain uniformed employees (S.6472)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Maltese, Padavan, Velella, Marchi, Spano, Leibell, Skelos, Balboni, Fuschillo, Hannon, Johnson, Lack, Lavalle, Marcellino, Trunzo and Morahan, S.5852-A, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.10373, "AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing benefits payable by the police and fire variable supplements funds to pension fund beneficiaries".
Items.MatterName: Increasing benefits payable by the police and fire variable supplements funds (S.5852-A, A.10373)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Maltese, Balboni, Hannon, Johnson, Lavalle, Leibell, Marcellino, Marchi, Morahan, Padavan, Spano, Trunzo and Velella, S.6473, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.10407, "AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the final average salary of members of the New York city police pension fund and fire department pension fund who are subject to the provisions of article eleven".
Items.MatterName: Final average salary of members of the New York city police pension fund and fire department pension fund (S.6473, A.10407)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Velella, S.5842-A, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.10357, "AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing accidental disability retirement benefits for certain members of the uniformed force of the New York city department of sanitation".
Items.MatterName: Accidental disability retirement benefits for certain members of the uniformed force of the New York city department of sanitation (S.5842-A, A.10357)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Velella, S.5842-A, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.10357, "AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing accidental disability retirement benefits for certain members of the uniformed force of the New York city department of sanitation".
Items.MatterName: Accidental disability retirement benefits for certain members of the uniformed force of the New York city department of sanitation (S.5842-A, A.10357)
